  24. def popup_status(request):
  25. return ('_popup' in request.REQUEST or 'pop' in request.REQUEST)
  28. def selectfolder_status(request):
  29. return ('select_folder' in request.REQUEST)
  32. def popup_param(request, separator="?"):
  33. if popup_status(request):
  34. return "%s_popup=1" % separator
  35. else:
  36. return ""
  38. def selectfolder_param(request, separator="&"):
  39. if selectfolder_status(request):
  40. return "%sselect_folder=1" % separator
  41. else:
  42. return ""
  45. def _userperms(item, request):
  46. r = []
  47. ps = ['read', 'edit', 'add_children']
  48. for p in ps:
  49. attr = "has_%s_permission" % p
  50. if hasattr(item, attr):
  51. x = getattr(item, attr)(request)
  52. if x:
  53. r.append(p)
  54. return r

  79. @login_required
  80. def make_folder(request, folder_id=None):
  81. if not folder_id:
  82. folder_id = request.REQUEST.get('parent_id', None)
  83. if folder_id:
  84. folder = Folder.objects.get(id=folder_id)
  85. else:
  86. folder = None
  88. if request.user.is_superuser:
  89. pass
  90. elif folder == None:
  91. # regular users may not add root folders unless configured otherwise
  92. if not filer_settings.FILER_ALLOW_REGULAR_USERS_TO_ADD_ROOT_FOLDERS:
  93. raise PermissionDenied
  94. elif not folder.has_add_children_permission(request):
  95. # the user does not have the permission to add subfolders
  96. raise PermissionDenied
  98. if request.method == 'POST':
  99. new_folder_form = NewFolderForm(request.POST)
  100. if new_folder_form.is_valid():
  101. new_folder = new_folder_form.save(commit=False)
  102. if (folder or FolderRoot()).contains_folder(new_folder.name):
  103. new_folder_form._errors['name'] = new_folder_form.error_class([_('Folder with this name already exists.')])
  104. else:
  105. new_folder.parent = folder
  106. new_folder.owner = request.user
  107. new_folder.save()
  108. return HttpResponse('<script type="text/javascript">' + \
  109. 'opener.dismissPopupAndReload(window);' + \
  110. '</script>')
  111. else:
  112. new_folder_form = NewFolderForm()
  113. return render_to_response('admin/filer/folder/new_folder_form.html', {
  114. 'new_folder_form': new_folder_form,
  115. 'is_popup': popup_status(request),
  116. 'select_folder': selectfolder_status(request),
  117. }, context_instance=RequestContext(request))

  134. @login_required
  135. def paste_clipboard_to_folder(request):
  136. if request.method == 'POST':
  137. folder = Folder.objects.get(id=request.POST.get('folder_id'))
  138. clipboard = Clipboard.objects.get(id=request.POST.get('clipboard_id'))
  139. if folder.has_add_children_permission(request):
  140. tools.move_files_from_clipboard_to_folder(clipboard, folder)
  141. tools.discard_clipboard(clipboard)
  142. else:
  143. raise PermissionDenied
  144. return HttpResponseRedirect('%s%s%s' % (
  145. request.REQUEST.get('redirect_to', ''),
  146. popup_param(request),
  147. selectfolder_param(request)))
  150. @login_required
  151. def discard_clipboard(request):
  152. if request.method == 'POST':
  153. clipboard = Clipboard.objects.get(id=request.POST.get('clipboard_id'))
  154. tools.discard_clipboard(clipboard)
  155. return HttpResponseRedirect('%s%s%s' % (
  156. request.POST.get('redirect_to', ''),
  157. popup_param(request),
  158. selectfolder_param(request)))

  172. @login_required
  173. def clone_files_from_clipboard_to_folder(request):
  174. if request.method == 'POST':
  175. clipboard = Clipboard.objects.get(id=request.POST.get('clipboard_id'))
  176. folder = Folder.objects.get(id=request.POST.get('folder_id'))
